name: 2017 Gift Shop Escape - the top room escape game
name_original: 2017 Gift Shop Escape - the top room escape game
description:
Welcome to 2017 Gift Shop Escape Game - a cool escape game!

Do you think you have the skills with 2017 Gift Shop Escape Game - a cool escape game?

2017 Gift Shop Escape is another new point and click type game, 2017 Gift Shop Escape game from Bamvd Game. In this escape game. Try to escape from the cage by finding items and by solving the puzzles. Use your best escape skills. Good luck and have fun.

Game features:

• Genuine story!
• Innovative puzzles!
• Stunning graphics!
• Realistic atmosphere!
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Gorgeous graphics !
• No signup's required, just download and install!
